title: The Barcode Prophecy
description: Grace lives a normal life. She goes to school during the day, and works part-time at the multinational corporation Global-1. She has a crush on a boy named Eric and wonders if he feels the same way. And when she turns seventeen, she's going to get a bar code tattoo.Her world seems very peaceful and predictable.But then it explodes.As soon as Grace gets the bar code tattoo, she comes home to find her family gone and Global-1 police swarming all over the place. In a split second, her life changes. Now she's on the run, part of a dark conspiracy and an extraordinary prophecy that will change the world forever.We have doomed ourselves.We have deluded ourselves.We must save ourselves.The bar code prophecy.
author: Suzanne Weyn
